actions.text: Proposed amendment SA 500 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 500 proposed by Senator Bond. (consideration: CR S4771-4775, S4805-4806; text as Senate disagreed to House amendment: CR S4771) To state the sense of the Senate regarding procedures that ensure that fair and equitable resolution of labor integration issues in transactions for the combination of air carriers.

references.type: text as Senate disagreed to House amendment

actions.text: Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 500 proposed by Senator Bond.

purpose: To state the sense of the Senate regarding procedures that ensure that fair and equitable resolution of labor integration issues in transactions for the combination of air carriers.
